colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES BUM CHOG 'DI NI SNYIGS MA'I DUS 'DIR RGYAL PO DANG BTZAN LA SOGS SDE BRGYAD DRANG SRONG 'BYUNG PO RNAMS KYIS 'TSE BA'I 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN PA'I CHED DU 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES MCHOD DPON PA SHES DAR BI LIG THU SHES RAB BZANG PO SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, DPAL MGON BZHAD RDOR MING CAN GYIS LCAGS KHYI LO BA'I DBYAR ZLA THA MA'I TSES BCU BDUN LA TSE CHOG THUN NVA GVA ZHES PA'I SA CHAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DBU MDZAD NGAG DBANG LEGS BSHAD KYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,DZA YANTU, ,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
